title: F22 Total Air War 2.20 + patch 2.21
description:
F22 TAW 2.0 version 2.20 and patch 2.21

I use Dgvoodoo Glide Wrapper (inclued with TAW 2.0) for 1920x1200 rendering. Working great on Win Xp.


- Description (combatsim.com) :

F-22 Total Air War 2.0 (TAW 2.0) is a total conversion of F-22 Total Air War (TAW), which also includes the campaigns from F-22 Air Dominance Fighter (ADF) and the Red Sea Operations (RSO) expansion disc. The goal of TAW 2.0 is to provide a simulation experience on a modern PC and OS that equals or surpasses your fond memories with the original ADF and TAW.


- Total Air War 2.0 Features :


Ã¢â‚¬Â¢Three new Dynamic Campaigns

Ã¢â‚¬Â¢New! Custom Weather available from the TAW 2.0 Launcher

Ã¢â‚¬Â¢Improved photorealistic terrain and new color palettes completely redefine the look of TAW

Ã¢â‚¬Â¢Mod Management, Configuration, References, and the Mission Editor (TAWBC) are all accessible from a single integrated menu

Ã¢â‚¬Â¢Configuration now allows you to choose your renderer, resolution, and Glide wrapper (if applicable) from the menu

Ã¢â‚¬Â¢Fullscreen and Widescreen versions now selectable

Ã¢â‚¬Â¢Increased integration with TAW Battle Commander (TAWBC) provides mission titles for your generated missions within the TAW mission menus

Ã¢â‚¬Â¢TAWBC Mission Enhancer (TME) Utility allows you to automatically enhance your TAWBC missions

Ã¢â‚¬Â¢Enhanced Avionics functionality

Ã¢â‚¬Â¢Ability to change between NVGs and natural light while zoomed into an MFD (Windows XP and later)

Ã¢â‚¬Â¢East/West palettes with Glide renderer allow for more natural light transitions during morning and twilight hours

Ã¢â‚¬Â¢Campaign Weapons Descriptions are now available

Ã¢â‚¬Â¢Added numerous selectable photorealistic F-22 skins, to include the YF-22 skin, the Nightstalker skin, and other Woodland, Urban, and Desert Camouflage patterns.

Ã¢â‚¬Â¢Formation lighting for night F-22 skins

Ã¢â‚¬Â¢Custom playlists available for in-game playback


- Features carried over from Total Air War 2008 :


Ã¢â‚¬Â¢30 custom missions

Ã¢â‚¬Â¢3 custom campaigns, 28 mission

Ã¢â‚¬Â¢Full Air Dominance Fighter (ADF) campaigns, 29 missions (Now also available in multiplayer)

Ã¢â‚¬Â¢Full Red Sea Operations (RSO) campaigns, 36 missions (Now also available in multiplayer)

Ã¢â‚¬Â¢Additional multiplayer missions, including three new head to head scenarios

Ã¢â‚¬Â¢New HUD (Improved and made more realistic)</li><li> Cloud enhancement

Ã¢â‚¬Â¢Improved Level of Detail (via mod)

Ã¢â‚¬Â¢Incorporated Head-Tracking (TrackIR and Freetrack

Ã¢â‚¬Â¢Improved/corrected MFDs

Ã¢â‚¬Â¢Added training ACMIs

Ã¢â‚¬Â¢Improved realistic Moon and Sun sizes

Ã¢â‚¬Â¢Replaced default Saudi, Egyptian, and USAF skins with photorealistic skins

Ã¢â‚¬Â¢Added selectable photorealistic F-22 skins, to include YF-22 skins, a photorealistic USAF Woodland skin, and a USAF Desert skin

Ã¢â‚¬Â¢Incorporated additional Tail Flashes:

Ã¢â‚¬Â¢Added Desert Flightsuit textures and improved in-cockpit textures

Ã¢â‚¬Â¢Improved MIDI support for Windows XP and more recent operating systems


Happy flying :)
